name: The Artifactening
description:
Game Creator Jam 2022 Submission

Goal is to collect the other two artifacts while dying the least number of times.

** EVERY TIME YOU TRANSITION TO CROW (by being shot and dying, falling and dying or just pressing the 'b' key), your death counter increases.**

Transitioning back to a person (diving into the ground or pressing 'b') will not increase your death counter.  Also, diving into the ground will kill any nearby enemies...  which seems useful.

Highly recommend hitting escape once in the gameplay to see all the controls!
